question.title: Match a constructor with a spotbugs filter file
question.body:
A Spotbugs filter file can be specific at matching a method.

Is it possible to restrict the filter to bugs associated with a constructor? For a class Boo I tried already <Method name="Boo"/> and <Method name="new"/>, just guessing, but those don't work.

To be more specific, the constructor is

EI_EXPOSE_REP2: may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object

and I want to suppress this specifically for the constructor and not for a setter.
